title: Manage Adverse Event from Social Media
description: An agent monitoring social media finds a public post describing a potential adverse event for a company product.

tasks.description: Identify a social media post that contains the minimum criteria for a valid AE case (identifiable patient, identifiable reporter, specific product, specific event).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a tweet mentioning a specific drug and a side effect.

tasks.description: Attempt to contact the reporter via direct message to request permission to discuss the event privately.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a compliant, pre-approved message to the user.

tasks.description: If contact is successful, capture the AE details. If not, create a case with the publicly available information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new adverse event case in the safety database using the information from the tweet.
